audit_metadata.auditor: Senior QA Engineer / UX Specialist AI Agent

first_impressions.visual_impression: Modern dark theme with purple/cyan gradients, glassmorphism effects, looks professional
main_concerns: 1736 lint errors and 819 warnings in codebase
positive_first_impressions: Clean, modern design aesthetic with consistent color palette
Good use of gradients and glass effects
Skip link for keyboard users implemented in App.tsx

blocking_issues.issue: 1,736 ESLint errors in codebase - many @typescript-eslint/no-explicit-any violations
blocking_issues.location: Throughout codebase, especially in archived files
blocking_issues.fix: Run npm run lint -- --fix to auto-fix, then manually fix remaining issues

blocking_issues.issue: Missing core/Logger.ts and core/ConfigManager.ts modules - had to create them during audit
blocking_issues.fix: Ensure Logger and ConfigManager modules are committed and properly implemented

blocking_issues.issue: 37/37 KuCoinService tests failing - test infrastructure broken
blocking_issues.impact: Cannot verify service functionality, potential production issues
blocking_issues.fix: Fix test dependencies and mock implementations

high_priority.issue: Only 64 ARIA attributes found across 24 component files - insufficient for complex trading UI
high_priority.impact: Screen reader users cannot navigate effectively
high_priority.fix: Add aria-label, aria-describedby, role attributes to interactive elements, charts, data tables

high_priority.issue: Only 2 files use tabIndex - keyboard navigation incomplete
high_priority.impact: Keyboard users cannot tab through all interactive elements
high_priority.fix: Add tabIndex to all interactive components, modals, dropdowns

high_priority.issue: Main bundle (index.js) is 293KB - above recommended 250KB threshold
high_priority.impact: Slower initial page load, worse mobile experience
high_priority.fix: Implement more aggressive code splitting, tree shaking, lazy loading

high_priority.issue: Empty .catch(() => ...) patterns found - silently swallowing errors
high_priority.impact: Errors hidden from users and developers, hard to debug production issues
high_priority.fix: Log errors, show user-friendly error messages, add error boundaries

high_priority.issue: CSS warnings in build - invalid template literal syntax in CSS
high_priority.location: Build output shows '${tool.rotate}deg' CSS syntax errors
high_priority.impact: CSS may not render correctly in some browsers
high_priority.fix: Fix dynamic CSS generation to use proper CSS-in-JS or CSS custom properties

medium_priority.issue: 819 lint warnings - unused variables, missing dependencies in hooks
medium_priority.impact: Potential bugs, memory leaks, stale closures
medium_priority.fix: Address react-hooks/exhaustive-deps warnings, remove unused code

medium_priority.issue: API framework tests have 2 failures - symbol/timeframe validation issues
medium_priority.impact: Invalid data may pass validation, potential security/UX issues
medium_priority.fix: Fix validation regex patterns for symbols and timeframes

medium_priority.issue: Font size variables defined but some components use hardcoded sizes (9px, 10px found)
medium_priority.impact: Inconsistent typography, very small text on some elements
medium_priority.fix: Use CSS variables --font-size-xs (12px) minimum, ensure WCAG AA compliance

medium_priority.impact: Potential XSS if ever used with user input
medium_priority.fix: Replace with CSS modules or Tailwind utilities for scrollbar hiding

medium_priority.issue: Large view files - EnhancedDashboardView.tsx is 1,132 lines
medium_priority.impact: Hard to maintain, test, and debug
medium_priority.fix: Split into smaller components, extract hooks and utilities

low_priority.issue: Multiple gradient animations and floating particles may impact battery on mobile
low_priority.fix: Reduce particle count, disable animations on mobile or when prefers-reduced-motion

low_priority.issue: Archived files (archive/) contain lint errors - cluttering lint output
low_priority.impact: Lint reports are noisy, hard to see real issues
low_priority.fix: Add archive/ to .eslintignore or remove archived files entirely

low_priority.issue: Mixed button styling - some use Button component, some use inline styles
low_priority.impact: Visual inconsistency across different parts of app
low_priority.fix: Standardize on the Button component from ui/button.tsx

low_priority.impact: Double-render detection disabled, potential bugs hidden
low_priority.fix: Re-enable StrictMode and fix any double-render issues

✅ Accessibility provider infrastructure exists
✅ Good focus-visible styles defined in index.css
✅ Reduced motion media query support implemented
✅ High contrast mode support exists
✅ Code splitting with manual chunks in vite config
✅ E2E test infrastructure with Playwright configured
✅ Comprehensive E2E test suite covering all views

✅ Secrets encryption vault for API keys (secretsVault.ts)

issues: Some inconsistency between index.css and theme.css color definitions
Multiple green values used for success (inconsistent)

typography.font_system: Inter, Segoe UI, system-ui (good fallback chain)

Some hardcoded px values instead of spacing tokens
Multiple button implementation patterns across codebase

Add role='region' with aria-label to dashboard sections
Ensure all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Add sr-only descriptions for charts and visualizations

optimizations_implemented: Manual code splitting for React and UI vendors
recommendations: Implement dynamic imports for heavy components
Add bundle analyzer to track size over time
Consider replacing framer-motion with lighter alternative for simple animations

positive: Environment variables used for sensitive config
No hardcoded API keys found in frontend code
concerns: No CSRF protection visible in frontend
Input sanitization patterns found but need verification
recommendations: Implement request signing for sensitive operations

issues: API framework validation tests partially failing (2 failures)

e2e_tests.coverage: All 24 views covered in test definitions
e2e_tests.note: Tests require running server to execute

recommendations: Fix failing unit tests before deployment
Add more component-level tests with Testing Library
Set up CI/CD pipeline to run tests on every commit

positive: Font sizes scale for different screens
concerns: Some components may overflow on 320px screens
Trading views may be cramped on mobile

must_fix_before_launch: Fix 1,736 lint errors (prioritize src/ files, ignore archive/)
Fix or disable failing unit tests
Commit Logger.ts and ConfigManager.ts to repository
Add missing ARIA attributes to key components
Fix CSS template literal syntax errors
nice_to_have: Implement offline mode with service workers
recommendation: DO NOT LAUNCH - Fix critical issues first. The application has a solid foundation with modern design and good architecture, but code quality issues (1700+ lint errors, failing tests) and accessibility gaps need to be addressed before production deployment. Prioritize: 1) Fix build/lint errors, 2) Fix failing tests, 3) Add accessibility attributes, 4) Performance optimization.
